dict.acceptation: 忽视，不顾；[法律]驳回（诉讼）；

sent.orig: It is a two-way in politics. When you ignore people, they are going to ignore you.
sent.trans: 这是政治上的一种有来必有往的现象，如果你不理睬人家，人家也不会来理睬你。

sent.orig: But almost all the companies ignore after-service of their companies, ignore the importance of after-service.
sent.trans: 但是，它们都忽略了企业的售后服务，忽略了售后服务对企业的重要性。

sent.orig: Why is the mood always ignore good ignore bad?
sent.trans: 为什么心情总是忽好忽坏的？

sent.orig: To work, some people ignore, while the wage for secondary students, it is a workout.
sent.trans: 打工，有的人对此不屑一顾，而打工对于中学生来说却是一种锻炼。

sent.orig: Ignore taxes and make further assumptions as necessary.
sent.trans: 忽略税收并作出所必需的进一步的假设。
